en: If it were not for great books, our lives would be much the poorer.
zh: 要是没有这些好书，我们的生活会贫乏得多。

en: But for the safety belt, I wouldn't be alive today.
zh: 要不是系了安全带，我今天就没命了。

en: If he wanted to get to London today, he should leave now.
zh: 他要是想今天赶到伦敦，现在就得出发。

en: I am wondering if you would like to go and see Kabuki with me while staying in Japan.
zh: 我在想，你来日本这段时间，想不想跟我一起去看看歌舞伎？

en: Please come to my house next Saturday if you care to.
zh: 下周六你要是想来的话，就来我家玩吧。

en: Until next weekend, if that's OK.
zh: 到下周末，你看行吗？

en: I'd like to invite you to lunch, if you're not busy.
zh: 如果你不忙的话，我想请你吃顿午饭。

en: Would you mind terribly making me a cup of coffee?
zh: 能不能麻烦你帮我冲杯咖啡？

en: If it is free, please send me a copy.
zh: 要是免费的话，请给我寄一份。

en: If they are not free, please let me know how much the catalogue and the postage to Japan are.
zh: 要不是免费的，请告诉我一下目录和寄到日本的邮费是多少钱。

en: If you wish us to reserve an alternative room, please let us know immediately.
zh: 如果你想让我们帮你预订别的房间，请立刻告诉我们。

en: If peace cannot be maintained with honor, it is no longer peace.
zh: 如果和平不能体面地维持，那就不再是和平了。

en: If he told me the truth, I would have forgiven him.
zh: 他要是早跟我说实话，我就原谅他了。

en: If the brain is dead, we should let the patient die.
zh: 如果大脑已经死亡了，我们就应该让病人走。

en: If he had carried the map with him, he wouldn't have got lost.
zh: 他要是带了地图，就不会迷路了。

en: If you cannot make full remittance, please get in touch with me by October 28, 1998.
zh: 如果你没法全额汇款，请在1998年10月28号之前联系我。

en: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.
zh: 要是上帝不存在，那也有必要造一个出来。

en: If I had had enough money, I would have bought the bag.
zh: 我要是钱够的话，就把那包买下来了。

en: If I were to tell him the truth, he would be angry.
zh: 我要是跟他说实话，他肯定会生气的。

en: If I were to be reborn, I would like to be a bird.
zh: 如果有下辈子，我想当一只鸟。

en: If I had to define life in a word, it would be: Life is creation.
zh: 如果非要用一个词来定义生活，那就是：生活就是创造。

en: If I could have a wish, I'd wish I could make up for lost time.
zh: 要是能许个愿，我希望能补回失去的时间。

en: If you should have any trouble, don't hesitate to come to me.
zh: 你要是遇到任何麻烦，尽管来找我。

en: If you are having temporary financial problems and it is the cause of your outstanding account, let us know about it.
zh: 如果你是因为手头紧才没能还清欠款，请跟我们说一声。

en: If anything comes up that you don't understand, come to me.
zh: 要是有什么不懂的，尽管来问我。

en: You'd better put aside some money for a rainy day.
zh: 你最好存点钱，以备不时之需。

en: You'd not have been in the rush hour if you had left home earlier.
zh: 你要是早点出门，就不会赶上早高峰了。

en: Had he worked harder, he could have succeeded.
zh: 他要是再努力点，本来是可以成功的。

en: If I had more time, I would learn how to dance.
zh: 要是我时间再多点，我就去学跳舞了。

en: And if I lose thy love, I lose my all.
zh: 要是失去了你的爱，我就失去了一切。

en: If the machine is damaged, you are responsible.
zh: 机器要是损坏了，你得负责。

en: Hello. May I speak to Mr Johnson, please?
zh: 喂，你好，请问强森先生在吗？

en: Hello. This is Joe Carlton. May I speak to Michael?
zh: 喂，我是乔·卡尔顿，请问麦克在吗？

en: Hello. This is Ogawa speaking.
zh: 喂，我是小川。

en: Are you there?
zh: 喂？还在吗？

en: Excuse me. That fare is not enough.
zh: 不好意思，这些钱不够付车费。

en: Hello, it's me. Could you come pick me up at the station?
zh: 喂，是我。你能来车站接我一下吗？

en: Hello, I'm Tomoko Sato from Japan.
zh: 你好，我是从日本来的佐藤智子。

en: Hello, is this the personnel department?
zh: 喂，请问是人事部吗？

en: Hello. Is this the Gotos' residence?
zh: 喂，请问是后藤家吗？

en: Hello, is the accountant there, please?
zh: 喂，请问会计在吗？

en: Excuse me, but do you need any help?
zh: 不好意思，需要帮忙吗？

en: Hello, is Mr Freeman in?
zh: 喂，请问弗里曼先生在吗？

en: Hello, this is Mike.
zh: 喂，我是麦克。

en: Operator, I'd like to place a call to Winnipeg, Canada, but I can't quite remember the number.
zh: 接线员，我想往加拿大的温尼伯打个电话，但我不太记得号码了。

en: If we have not covered all the questions you asked, please inform us.
zh: 如果我们还有没回答到的问题，请告诉我们。

en: If Cleopatra's nose had been shorter, the whole face of the world would have been changed.
zh: 要是埃及艳后的鼻子短了那么一点，整个世界的历史可能就重写了。

en: With a little more patience, you would have succeeded.
zh: 你要是再多点耐心，本来就成功了。

en: If it had not been for your advice, I would have failed in my business.
zh: 要不是因为你的建议，我的生意就搞砸了。

en: Please let us know if we can be of help in other ways.
zh: 如果还有其他能帮上忙的地方，请随时告诉我们。

en: If the delay is simply an oversight, will you please take care of it at once?
zh: 如果延迟只是因为疏忽，能不能请您立刻处理一下？

en: We accept making a reduction in price of 5% if this will help you to develop a new market for our products.
zh: 如果能帮你们开拓产品的新市场，我们接受降价5%。

en: If music be the food of love, play on.
zh: 如果音乐是爱情的食粮，请继续演奏吧。

en: Please let me know if I can provide you with any further information, or if you would like to contact me for questions.
zh: 如果还需要其他信息，或者有问题想找我，请随时告诉我。

en: Please disregard this notice if your shipment has already been made.
zh: 如果货物已经发出，请忽略这条通知。

en: Should you have settled the account since this mail was written, please ignore our reminder.
zh: 如果您在收到邮件前已经结清了账单，请忽略我们的提醒。

en: Please let me know immediately if you would like to use this computer.
zh: 如果你想用这台电脑，请马上告诉我。

en: If Mary knew how to swim, she would go to the beach more often.
zh: 要是玛丽会游泳，她肯定会经常去海边。

en: If Bob had taken my advice, everything would be all right now.
zh: 要是鲍勃当初听了我的建议，现在就什么事都没有了。

en: If you want any more wine, go to the cellar and get some.
zh: 如果你还想喝点酒，去地窖里拿就行。

en: If you happen to hear of anybody that wants to buy a house, please let me know.
zh: 如果你刚好听说有人想买房，请跟我说一声。

en: If he has time, he will come.
zh: 他要有时间的话就会来的。

en: If you are going to have a party, please count me in.
zh: 你们要是办派对，请一定要算我一个。

en: I will help you if possible.
zh: 如果可能的话，我会帮你的。

en: If you fail, you can always ask for his help.
zh: 如果你失败了，随时可以找他帮忙。

en: Had I known it, I'd have told you about that.
zh: 我要是早知道，就告诉你了。

en: If I had known it, I would have gone there.
zh: 我要是早知道，就去那儿了。

en: If you are to do it, you must make a good start.
zh: 你要是打算做，就得有个好的开头。

en: You need your parents' permission if you are going to apply for that.
zh: 你要是想申请那个，得先征得父母同意。

en: Suppose it were true, what would you do?
zh: 假设那是真的，你会怎么办？

en: If it is true, it follows that Nakagawa is guilty.
zh: 如果那是真的，那中川肯定有罪。

en: If I thought I could get away with it, I wouldn't pay tax at all.
zh: 如果我觉得能逃掉，我肯定一分钱税都不交。

en: He would be very glad to hear the news.
zh: 他要是听到这个消息肯定会很高兴。

en: If you find the man, please let me know at once.
zh: 如果你找到了那个人，请立刻告诉我。

en: If that washing machine goes wrong again, I shall complain to the manufacturer.
zh: 要是那台洗衣机再出毛病，我就去投诉厂家。

en: If you had not followed the doctor's advice then, you might be ill now.
zh: 如果你当时没听医生的话，现在可能还没好呢。

en: If it had not been for the accident, we would have been in time.
zh: 要不是出了意外，我们本来能准时赶到的。

en: To investigate the incident would take us at least three weeks.
zh: 调查这件事起码得花我们三周时间。

en: If you see it, you'll go bananas.
zh: 你要是看到它，肯定会疯掉的。

en: But for the doctor's care, the patient would not be alive.
zh: 要不是医生的照料，那个病人就活不下来了。

en: If I had known the news, I would have told you.
zh: 我要是早知道这个消息，早就告诉你了。

en: If he could not answer the riddle, he would be eaten.
zh: 如果他答不上那个谜语，就会被吃掉。

en: If you will lend me the money, I shall be much obliged to you.
zh: 如果你能借钱给我，我会非常感激的。

en: Had it not been for the money, we would not have succeeded.
zh: 要不是因为那笔钱，我们是不可能成功的。

en: If I had the money, I would make a trip around the world.
zh: 如果我有钱，我就去环游世界了。

en: If he had been there, I could have given him your message.
zh: 如果他当时在那儿，我就能把你的话带给他了。

en: If it were not for sports, how dull school life would be!
zh: 要是没有体育运动，学校生活该多没意思啊！

en: If all went according to her plan, she would be in great demand.
zh: 如果一切按她的计划进行，她会变得非常抢手。

en: If Sue is coming by air, she ought to arrive very soon.
zh: 如果苏是坐飞机来的，那她应该快到了。

en: Please tell me if I get in your way.
zh: 如果我挡着你了，请告诉我。

en: If Jane's mother were in Japan, I could invite her to the Doll's Festival.
zh: 要是简的妈妈在日本，我就能请她参加女儿节了。

en: I should like to call on you this evening.
zh: 我想今晚去拜访您。

en: If you have any questions, please let me know.
zh: 如果有任何问题，请随时告诉我。

en: If it were not for the computer, how inconvenient our lives would be!
zh: 要是没有电脑，我们的生活该多不方便啊！

en: If he carries on like this, he's going to wind up in prison.
zh: 如果他再这样下去，早晚得进监狱。

en: If you think this is wrong, you must speak out.
zh: 如果你觉得这不对，就得大声说出来。

en: If this proposal is put into practice, the business world will be affected to a significant degree.
zh: 如果这个提议付诸实施，商界将受到很大影响。

en: We're going to find ourselves in difficulty if we carry on like this.
zh: 如果我们继续这样下去，会有麻烦的。

en: If you want this job, you must apply for it by tomorrow.
zh: 如果你想要这份工作，最迟明天就得申请。

en: If she had not studied English here, she could not have passed the examination.
zh: 要不是在这儿学了英语，她是不可能通过考试的。

en: If the coffee is too strong, add some more water.
zh: 咖啡要是太浓了，就再加点水。

en: If your coffee is too strong, add some sugar.
zh: 咖啡要是太浓了，就加点糖。

en: If you eat any cake, I'll whip you.
zh: 你要是敢吃蛋糕，我就抽你。

en: If Grace had not studied so hard, she would surely have failed the test.
zh: 要不是格蕾丝学习那么用功，她这次考试肯定不及格。

en: You will have to take his place in case he cannot come.
zh: 要是他没法来，你就得替他的位置。

en: If he had been honest, they would have employed him.
zh: 他要是当初老实点，他们肯定就录用他了。

en: If I had enough money, I would buy the book.
zh: 我要是有足够的钱，就把那本书买了。

en: It might rain tomorrow.
zh: 明天可能会下雨。

en: He might come tomorrow.
zh: 他明天可能会来。

en: Is there any chance of my borrowing your typewriter?
zh: 能不能借你的打字机用用？

en: Hey, has this been sitting out on the dinner table all day? It has to go in the refrigerator or it'll go bad.
zh: 嘿，这东西是不是在桌上放了一整天了？得放进冰箱，不然该坏了。

en: Do you happen to know how to get downtown from here?
zh: 你知不知道从这儿去市中心怎么走？

en: It might rain before evening.
zh: 傍晚前可能会下雨。

en: He might change his mind.
zh: 他可能会改变主意。

en: It occurs to me that I may have misunderstood you.
zh: 我突然想到，我可能误会你的意思了。

en: If you come this way by any chance, drop in to see me.
zh: 你要是恰好路过这儿，就顺便来看看我。

en: He said that if he had much money, he would buy the dictionary.
zh: 他说他要是钱够多，就会买那本词典。

en: If you need any money, I'll lend you some.
zh: 你要是缺钱，我借给你点儿。

en: If you want any money, I will lend you some.
zh: 你要是想要钱，我可以借给你。

en: If I had money, I would buy that camera. As it is, I cannot buy it.
zh: 我要是有钱就把那台相机买了，可惜现在买不起。

en: If you don't have money, you have to do without.
zh: 没钱的话，也就只能将就了。

en: I might have to be very angry with you if you were to come alone.
zh: 你要是敢一个人来，我真的会跟你生气的。

en: If Grandma doesn't come, the children will be disappointed.
zh: 奶奶要是没来，孩子们会很失望的。

en: Without the ozone layer, we would be in danger.
zh: 要是没有臭氧层，我们就有危险了。

en: If I'm away from home for a period of time, I will stop mail delivery.
zh: 我要是出一阵子远门，就会把邮件投递停掉。

en: If something doesn't make sense, it probably isn't logical.
zh: 要是哪儿说不通，可能就是逻辑有问题。

en: If it hadn't been for the storm, we would have been in time.
zh: 要不是那场暴风雨，我们肯定准时到了。

en: Americans would have responded differently from Japanese.
zh: 美国人的反应肯定会跟日本人不一样。

en: If you want to study in the United States, you need to get a student visa.
zh: 想去美国留学的话，得办学生签证。

en: Without water, the soldiers would have died.
zh: 要是没有水，那些士兵早就没命了。

en: If he had been with me then, I would not have done such a thing.
zh: 他当时要是跟我在一起，我也不会干出那种事。

en: If he had not met with that accident, he would be alive now.
zh: 要不是出了那场意外，他现在还活着。

en: If I had been in time for the train, I would be there now.
zh: 我要是赶上那班火车，现在已经到那儿了。

en: Were it not for your help, I could never succeed.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我根本不可能成功。

en: If it had not been for your help, I would have failed.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your help, I would have lost the game.
zh: 要不是因为你帮忙，我那场比赛肯定输了。

en: But for your help, I could not have done it.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我肯定做不成。

en: If it had not been for your help, we might have failed.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我们可能就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your help, I would certainly have failed.
zh: 要不是你帮忙， I would certainly have failed.

en: Were I you, I would apply for the job.
zh: 我要是你，我就去应聘那份工作。

en: If you can't come, send someone in your stead.
zh: 你要是来不了，就找个人替你。

en: I should be very pleased if you could come.
zh: 你要是能来，我真的会很高兴。

en: If you are silent in a conversation or social situation for a long time, Americans will try to get you to talk.
zh: 在聊天或者社交场合，你要是长时间不吭声，美国人会想办法让你开口。

en: If you do not go fishing tomorrow, I will not either.
zh: 你明天要是去不了钓鱼，我也不去了。

en: If you go fishing tomorrow, I will, too.
zh: 你明天要是去钓鱼，我也去。

en: If you didn't have him to exchange letters with, you would be lonely.
zh: 要是没有他跟你通信，你肯定会觉得很寂寞。

en: If you are to succeed, you must work harder.
zh: 你要想成功，就得更努力才行。

en: Even if you know the truth, you had better pretend otherwise at present.
zh: 就算你知道真相，现在最好也装作不知道。

en: If you had not helped me, I would have failed.
zh: 要不是你帮我，我肯定搞砸了。

en: Had it not been for your help, I would have been fired.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我肯定被炒鱿鱼了。

en: If you think you can get away with cheating on the exam, you've got another thing coming.
zh: 你要是觉得考试作弊能蒙混过关，那你可就想错了。

en: I will do it on condition that you support me.
zh: 只要你支持我，我就去做。

en: If you were in my place, what would you do?
zh: 如果换做是你，你会怎么办？

en: What would you say if you were in my place?
zh: 要是换成是你，你会怎么说？

en: Don't forget that, if you are on a diet, skipping breakfast will not help you.
zh: 别忘了，你要是想减肥，不吃早饭是一点用也没有的。

en: If you had not eaten so much, you would not be so sleepy now.
zh: 你要是刚才没吃那么多，现在也就不会这么困了。

en: Suppose it rains tomorrow, shall we still go on the picnic?
zh: 万一明天要是下雨了，咱们还去野餐吗？

en: It will have been raining for a week if it does not stop tomorrow.
zh: 明天要是再不停，这雨就整整下了一周了。

en: If he can do that, I will eat my hat.
zh: 他要是能做到那个，太阳就打西边出来了。

en: Had we left home at seven, we could have arrived on time.
zh: 咱们要是七点就出门，现在早准时到了。

en: If you are to finish the work before June, you will have to work much better.
zh: 要是想在六月前把活干完，你可得加把劲了。

en: If you will excuse me for a few minutes, I'd like to make a call.
zh: 不好意思失陪几分钟，我想去打个电话。

en: What would you do if you were ten years younger?
zh: 要是你年轻十岁，你会想干点啥？

en: If you come my way, drop in on me.
zh: 你要是路过我这儿，记得过来坐坐。

en: If I had had more money, I would have bought the pen.
zh: 我当时要是钱够的话，就把那支笔买了。

en: If I were you, I would paint it blue.
zh: 我要是你的话，就把它漆成蓝色。

en: Were I you, I would not do such a thing.
zh: 我要是你，我才不会干那种事呢。

en: I apologize if I hurt your feelings.
zh: 要是我刚才伤到你了，我向你道歉。

en: If you break the clock again, you'll catch it from Mommy.
zh: 你要是再把钟弄坏，你就等着被老妈收拾吧。

en: If it's going to require a total restructuring, I'm sure they will be satisfied with the old system.
zh: 要是得彻底重组，我看他们肯定还是觉得老系统更好。

en: Mrs. Brown warned Beth that if she didn't eat properly she would be permanently overweight.
zh: 布朗太太警告贝丝，要是再不好好吃饭，她这辈子都瘦不下来了。

en: If you were footing the bill, you wouldn't say that.
zh: 要是让你来买单，你肯定就不会这么说了。

en: We don't have any more bread.
zh: 咱们没面包了。

en: Please don't mumble.
zh: 说话别在那嘀嘀咕咕的。

en: I've been to the mall.
zh: 我去过商场了。

en: I don't really like the stores there.
zh: 我不太喜欢那儿的店。

en: Should we go to the mall?
zh: 咱们要去商场吗？

en: A motel is like a hotel only much smaller and is used mostly by people traveling by automobile.
zh: 汽车旅馆跟酒店差不多，就是规模小点，主要是给开车旅行的人住的。

en: I'd like some information on motels.
zh: 我想了解一下汽车旅馆的信息。

en: Mozart was greater than any other composer of his time.
zh: 莫扎特比他那个时代的任何作曲家都要伟大。

en: Mozart was brought up to be a musician.
zh: 莫扎特从小就是按音乐家的标准培养的。

en: The music of Mozart is always pleasing to me.
zh: 莫扎特的音乐总能让我心情愉悦。

en: Mozart's life was very short.
zh: 莫扎特的一生非常短暂。

en: Did you start to learn the piano when you were three, like Mozart?
zh: 你也像莫扎特那样，三岁就开始学钢琴了吗？

en: It has been 200 years since Mozart died.
zh: 莫扎特已经去世两百年了。

en: The motor started to run.
zh: 发动机发动了。

en: There is nothing the matter with the motor.
zh: 发动机没啥毛病。

en: The motor does not function properly.
zh: 发动机出毛病了。

en: We're not getting anywhere.
zh: 咱们这样根本没进展。

en: Have you answered that letter yet?
zh: 那封信你回了吗？

en: It's about time you were independent of your parents.
zh: 你也该自立了，别老指望你爸妈。

en: You can leave now. I'll see to our luggage.
zh: 你先走吧，行李我来盯着。

en: Have you eaten your dinner already?
zh: 你已经吃过晚饭了吗？

en: I've already had my supper.
zh: 我已经吃过晚饭了。

en: Have you eaten dinner yet?
zh: 你吃晚饭了没？

en: It's time you had a dose of your medicine.
zh: 你该吃药了。

en: It's midnight already.
zh: 都已经半夜了。

en: It's already ten o'clock at night.
zh: 都已经晚上十点了。

en: Even at nighttime, it was not quiet and peaceful any more.
zh: 哪怕是到了晚上，这里也不再安宁了。

en: There's no turning back.
zh: 没回头路了。

en: I'm so full.
zh: 撑死我了。

en: I really must say good-bye.
zh: 我真的得走了。

en: Have you read the book yet?

en: I'm appalled. You leave me speechless.

en: It's getting dark early around here. The sun seems to drop like a rock when autumn rolls around.
zh: 这儿天黑得特别早。一到秋天，太阳就跟掉下去似的。

en: Have you got over your cold yet?

en: Have you cleaned your room yet?

en: You can leave the room now.
zh: 你可以离开房间了。

en: Have you called her yet?
zh: 你给她打电话了吗？

en: It is time for her to go home.
zh: 她该回家了。

en: Now that he has graduated, he must become more serious.
zh: 既然他毕业了，就得变得稳重一点了。

en: I can not put up with his insults any longer.
zh: 我再也受不了他的侮辱了。

en: I can wait for him no longer.
zh: 我没法再等他了。

en: Did you call him yet?
zh: 你给他打电话了吗？

en: Have you met him already?
zh: 你已经见过他了吗？

en: Have you met him yet?
zh: 你见过他了吗？

en: I've had it with him.
zh: 我受够他了。

en: I won't talk with him anymore.
zh: 我再也不想跟他说话了。

en: It's high time you had your hair cut; it has grown too long.
zh: 你早该剪头发了，长得太长了。

en: Seeing that it is 8 o'clock, I think you should leave for school soon.
zh: 都八点了，我觉得你该去上学了。

en: Here it's August and our summer vacation is nearly over.
zh: 都八月了，暑假快结束了。

en: It's out of stock, but I can give you a rain check.
zh: 卖完了，不过我可以给你开个凭证，等下次到货还按这个价给你。

en: Have you written all the New Year's cards already?
zh: 贺年卡你都写好了吗？

en: I feel my age.
zh: 我感觉自己老了。

en: Never again would she be curious about the city.
zh: 她再也不会对这座城市感到好奇了。

en: Never again would she want to live there.
zh: 她再也不想住在那儿了。

en: You should not take to drinking again.
zh: 你别再喝酒了。

en: I've decided not to keep a dog again.
zh: 我决定再也不养狗了。

en: You had better not go there again.
zh: 你最好别再去了。

en: Never be this late again.
zh: 下次千万别再这么晚了。

en: You will be able to speak fluent English in another few months.
zh: 再过几个月，你的英语就能说得很流利了。

en: It's time you stood on your own two feet.
zh: 你该独立自强了。

en: Have you worked out the answer yet?
zh: 答案你算出来了吗？

en: I've got to hang up now. Someone is waiting to use the phone.
zh: 我得挂了，有人等着打电话呢。

en: It is about time we bought a new microwave oven.
zh: 咱们该买个新微波炉了。

en: I haven't seen her for ages.
zh: 我好久没见她了。

en: I'm beat. I've been working from dawn to dusk.
zh: 累死我了，我从早忙到晚。

en: Have you eaten lunch yet?
zh: 你吃过午饭了吗？

en: I have already eaten lunch.
zh: 我已经吃过午饭了。

en: Have you eaten your lunch yet?
zh: 你吃午饭了吗？

en: It's getting late. I don't wanna go home alone.
zh: 天不早了，我不想一个人回家。

en: Seeing that it is late, we should go home.
zh: 天色不早了，咱们该回家了。

en: It's late.
zh: 太晚了。

en: It's getting late, so we'd better get going.
zh: 天不早了，咱们该走了。

en: As it is late, turn off the TV.
zh: 天不早了，把电视关了吧。

en: We'd better roll now.
zh: 咱们该撤了。

en: Now that the weather is warmer, I can go outdoors.
zh: 天气暖和了，我可以去户外了。

en: No one trusts him any more.
zh: 再也没人相信他了。

en: Now that you are grown-up, it is up to you to decide what to do.
zh: 既然你已经长大了，该怎么做由你自己决定。

en: It's OK now. Don't worry. You can depend on me one hundred percent.
zh: 没事了。别担心，你完全可以信任我。

en: Now that you're a college student, you should study harder.
zh: 你既然都上大学了，就该更努力学习。

en: Now that you are a college student, you should know better.
zh: 你都大学生了，应该懂点事了。

en: Now you are a big boy, behave yourself.
zh: 你都大孩子了，规矩点。

en: I can't wait any more.

en: I don't feel like waiting any longer.
zh: 我不想再等了。

en: It is time my son came home from school.
zh: 我儿子该放学回家了。

en: We think that there should be no more wars.
zh: 我们觉得不该再有战争了。

en: It's already cleared up.
zh: 天已经晴了。

en: I have been reading this for a few hours.
zh: 这个我看了好几个小时了。

en: It's high time you got married and settled down.
zh: 你早该成家立业了。

en: There is now no God and no Buddha.
zh: 现在已经没有神，也没有佛了。

en: Now that you know the truth, perhaps you'll feel better.
zh: 既然你知道真相了，心里或许会好受点。

en: Have you done with the paper?

en: You should get yourself a new car now.
zh: 你该换辆新车了。

en: It's time to go to bed.
zh: 该睡觉了。

en: It's time to go to bed. Turn off the radio.
zh: 该睡觉了，把收音机关了。

en: It's time you went to bed.
zh: 你该去睡觉了。

en: It is time to go to bed.
zh: 到点睡觉了。

en: I will hit the sack.
zh: 我要去睡了。

en: It's high time you were in bed.
zh: 你早该上床睡觉了。

en: Now that we have eaten, let's go.
zh: 既然吃饱了，咱们走吧。

en: May I start eating now?
zh: 我现在可以开始吃了吗？

en: I could not eat another bite.
zh: 我一口也吃不下了。

en: I can't eat any more.
zh: 我吃不下了。

en: I am already accustomed to sitting on tatami.

en: It's time to get aboard.
zh: 该上去了。

en: I want to sleep a little more.
zh: 我想再睡会儿。

en: Take things a little more seriously.
zh: 认真点儿。

en: I wish I were a little taller.
zh: 我要是再高点就好了。

en: Rack your brains a little harder.
zh: 再多动动脑子。

en: As he gets older, your son will grow more independent.
zh: 随着孩子慢慢长大，他会越来越独立的。

en: With a little more patience, you could have succeeded.
zh: 要是再耐心点，你本来可以成功的。

en: With a little more effort, he would have succeeded.
zh: 要是再努力点，他本来能成功的。

en: A little more effort, and you will succeed.
zh: 再加把劲，你就能成功。

en: Can't you stay a little longer?

en: With a little more care, the driver could have avoided such a tragic accident.
zh: 要是司机再小心点，本来能避免这么惨的车祸。

en: I should have paid a little more attention.
zh: 我本来该再多留点心的。

en: With a little more care, you would have succeeded.

en: With a little more wisdom, he would not have got in trouble.

en: A little louder.
zh: 大点声。

en: Don't you have another one that's a little larger?
zh: 你这儿有没有再大点儿的？

en: Could you give me a few more minutes?

en: You may as well wait for a while. It'll clear up soon.
zh: 你还是等会儿吧，天很快就晴了。

en: Had you come a little earlier, you could have met her.
zh: 你要是早点来，就能见到她了。

en: Had they left a little earlier, they would have avoided the traffic jam.
zh: 他们要是早点出发，就不会遇上堵车了。

en: If I had left a little earlier, I would have caught the last train.

en: If you had left a little earlier, you would have avoided the heavy traffic.

en: If you had left home a little earlier you would have been in time.
zh: 你要是早点出门，就赶得上了。

en: Move forward one step.

en: Do you think you could make a little less noise?

en: Give me a little more water.

en: You could have solved this puzzle with a little more patience.
zh: 要是你再耐心点，就能解开这个谜题了。

en: Would you explain it in more detail?

en: Please turn down the volume a little bit more.

en: Do you have one a little smaller?

en: Would you like some more?

en: May I ask you some more questions?

en: Put in a little more sugar.

en: I'll think about it.

en: I think I'll look around a little more.

en: Can I have some more milk?

en: I wish I had a better memory.

en: Can you hold on a little longer?

en: I want you to straighten up the environment a little more.
zh: 我希望你把环境再收拾整齐点。

en: If she had been a little more patient, she could have succeeded.
zh: 她要是再耐心点，本可以成功的。

en: If you had been a little more patient, you could have succeeded.
zh: 你要是再耐心点，本可以成功的。

en: If you had been a little more patient, you would have succeeded.
zh: 你要是再耐心一点，就成功了。

en: Would you like to turn it down a little?

en: A little heavier rain might cause a flood.
zh: 雨再大一点可能就会发洪水。

en: A little more to the right, just like so!
zh: 再往右边一点，对，就这样！

en: We would have bought the plane tickets if the price had been a little lower.
zh: 如果机票再便宜点，我们就买了。

en: Can you give me a discount?
zh: 能便宜点吗？

en: Can't you bring down the price a bit?

en: Do you have a cheaper room?

en: Do you have a room that's a little cheaper?

en: Could you give me a better price?

en: Turn the radio down a little.

en: Please speak a little more slowly.

en: Would you speak more slowly, please?

en: Would you mind speaking more slowly?

en: I think we should do some more.
zh: 我觉得我们该再多做点。

en: Why don't you try expressing your opinion a little more gently? Think about how he feels getting told flatly that he's being cut loose.
zh: 你说话能不能再委婉点？想想他被直接炒了是什么心情。

en: Put some more wood on the fire.

en: Would you like some more beef?

en: Just a little more patience.

en: I'd like some more bread, please.
zh: 请再给我点面包。

en: I almost got a perfect score.
zh: 我差点就拿满分了。

en: I almost forgot it.
zh: 我差点忘了。

en: I barely escaped being hit by the truck.
zh: 我差点被那辆卡车撞到。

en: It is almost 12 o'clock.
zh: 快12点了。

en: Would you like some more salad?

en: Add a little more pepper.

en: Won't you have some more coffee?
zh: 再喝点咖啡吧？

en: Will you have some more cake?
zh: 再吃点蛋糕吗？

en: Would you like some more cake?
zh: 还要再来点蛋糕吗？

en: If you had made more effort, you would have passed the entrance examination.
zh: 你要是再努力点，就能考上了。

en: Can I have some more tea?

en: I should think we will need some more money.
zh: 我觉得我们还得再要点钱。

en: We could have bought the car with a little more money.

en: Why don't you stay a little while?
zh: 怎么不再多待一会儿？

en: Could you speak a little louder please?
zh: 麻烦你说大声点好吗？

en: You must put some life into your work.
zh: 你工作得带点劲儿啊。

en: The jig is up; let's face the music like men.
zh: 露馅了，咱们还是像个男人一样承担后果吧。

en: I gave up all hope of survival.
zh: 我完全不抱活下去的希望了。

en: I guess we should leave now.
zh: 我想我们该走了。

en: Can I leave now?

en: I may as well go now.

en: You had better not go out now. It's almost 11.
zh: 你现在最好别出门，都快十一点了。

en: Have you handed in your homework?

en: Have you finished your homework yet?
zh: 你作业写完了吗？

en: Have you finished your homework already?
zh: 你居然已经把作业写完了？

en: Have you finished your homework?
zh: 你作业写完了吗？

en: Would you mind waiting another ten minutes?

en: I have had more than enough.

en: Time is up.
zh: 时间到了。

en: Are you through yet?

en: Have you finished already?
zh: 你这就做完了？

en: Have you finished yet?
zh: 你做完了吗？

en: It's on its last legs.
zh: 它快不行了。

en: It's time to work now. Let's get down to business.
zh: 该干活了，咱们谈正事吧。

en: The damage is done.
zh: 造成的损害已经没法挽回了。

en: Have you washed your hands yet?

en: My hand's getting too cold.
zh: 我手冻得不行了。

en: I weep for my lost youth.
zh: 我为我逝去的青春流泪。

en: He's no spring chicken.
zh: 他已经不年轻了。

en: May I be excused?

en: It's 7:30 now-I must fly.
zh: 都七点半了，我得赶紧走了。

en: We have no time.
zh: 我们没时间了。

en: Now that we're alone, let's have fun.
zh: 既然现在没别人，咱们好好玩玩吧。

en: Don't regard me as your father anymore.
zh: 别再把我当你爸了。

en: I will make it clear that I won't come again.
zh: 我会明确说明，我以后不来了。

en: Now that I'm a grownup, I think otherwise.
zh: 既然我长大了，想法就不一样了。

en: Now I can look after myself.
zh: 我现在能照顾自己了。

en: It is time for me to take a vacation.
zh: 我该去度假了。

en: I've made up my mind.
zh: 我已经决定了。

en: Please don't write letters to me anymore.
zh: 请别再给我写信了。

en: It's time for us to go home.
zh: 咱们该回家了。

en: I'd better get going. My father is really strict.
zh: 我最好还是走吧，我爸管得特别严。

en: Since you are no longer a child, you should be responsible for what you do.
zh: 既然你已经不是小孩子了，就该对自己的行为负责。

en: Since you are no longer a child, you are to take care of yourself.
zh: 既然你已经不是小孩了，你就得自己照顾自己了。

en: It is time you left off your childish ways.
zh: 你该改掉那副孩子气了。

en: It's high time the children went to bed.
zh: 孩子们早该去睡觉了。

en: I've already finished my work.
zh: 我已经把活儿干完了。

en: Now I must go about my work.
zh: 我现在得去忙工作了。

en: It's time you went to the barber's.
zh: 你该去理发了。

en: I think we had better wait another thirty minutes.
zh: 我觉得咱们最好再等三十分钟。

en: The matter was settled.
zh: 这事儿已经解决了。

en: My age is going to tell on me.
zh: 岁数大了，身体大不如前了。

en: Have you read today's paper yet?
zh: 你看今天的报纸了吗？

en: It was really good.
zh: 真的很棒。

en: I am feeling much better now.
zh: 我现在感觉好多了。

en: I have to leave now.
zh: 我现在得走了。

en: I have got to go now.
zh: 我得走了。

en: I've got to leave soon.
zh: 我一会儿就得走了。

en: It's high time to go. See you later.
zh: 时间不早了，我得走了，回头见。

en: I must leave now.
zh: 我现在必须得走了。

en: Got to go now.
zh: 先走了啊。

en: We have our backs to the wall.
zh: 我们现在已经没有退路了。

en: I'll say no more.
zh: 我就不多说了。

en: I don't want to hear any more excuses.
zh: 我不想再听任何借口了。

en: No, thank you.
zh: 不用了，谢谢。

en: Let's patch up our argument.
zh: 咱们和好吧。

en: Have you arrived at a decision yet?
zh: 你决定好了吗？

en: It is time you put a stop to this nonsense.
zh: 你该别再胡闹了。

en: Now that you are a high school student, you are responsible for what you do.
zh: 既然你都上高中了，得对自己做的事负责。

en: I'm fed up with always backing you up.
zh: 我受够了老是帮你撑腰。

en: You had better hurry because the banks will close soon.
zh: 你最好快点，银行快关门了。

en: Let's be done with the argument.
zh: 咱们别再争了。

en: Let's not argue anymore.
zh: 别再吵了。

en: This is the time you should get up.
zh: 你该起床了。

en: It's time we went home.
zh: 我们该回家了。

en: It's about time you got up.
zh: 你早该起床了。

en: Can I go home now?

en: You can go home now.
zh: 你现在可以回家了。

en: It's already time to go home.
zh: 已经到点儿该回家了。

en: Hadn't we better be going now?

en: I'd better be on my way.
zh: 我该走了。

en: I guess I'll have to leave now.
zh: 我看我得走了。

en: Will you permit us to leave now?
zh: 我们可以走了吗？

en: You may as well go home now.
zh: 你现在回家也行。

en: I don't have to wear glasses any more.
zh: 我不用再戴眼镜了。

en: I fear we are too late.
zh: 恐怕我们来晚了。

en: I have had enough of sweets.
zh: 甜食我吃够了。

en: It is time to go to school.
zh: 该去上学了。

en: This is the last straw!
zh: 我真的忍无可忍了！

en: I can't take this anymore. I've lost my temper completely.
zh: 我受不了了，我彻底发火了。

en: I can't take it any more.
zh: 我受不了了。

en: I can't stand it anymore.
zh: 我再也受不了了。

en: You'd better go home now.
zh: 你最好现在回家。

en: May I go home now?

en: You'd better go back home now.
zh: 你最好现在回家去。

en: How many times are you going to make me say it? Do you know how many times I've tried to wake you up?
zh: 你要让我说多少遍？你知道我叫了你多少次了吗？

en: I'm sure that family is familiar with Japanese tastes in food. They've hosted quite a few Japanese exchange students.
zh: 我敢说那家人很了解日本人的口味，他们接待过不少日本留学生。

en: It already has taken me hours.
zh: 已经花了我好几个小时了。

en: Have you decided what to do yet?
zh: 你决定好怎么办了吗？

en: That was hard to believe.

zh: 要是再多一千日元，他就一共拿了一万日元了。

en: I can't live any longer without him.

en: We have already finished our dinner.

en: Now I'm wide awake.

en: Now it's time to say good night.

en: I'm sick and tired of his lack of taste.

en: Do any of the members agree with you?

en: I have lost face completely.

en: Mary burst into the kitchen.

en: Mary wants to become a teacher.

en: Mary can dance well.

zh: 旋转木马的负责人决定检查一下，确保一切运转正常。

en: Please pass the note around.

en: Maybe I ought to expand the memory.

zh: 为了获得媒体关注，艾滋病患者有时不得不把自己推向公众视野。

en: It hardly ever rains here.

en: I seldom go to a library.

en: It's getting quite springlike.

en: Read the message once more.

en: Meg looks pleased with her new dress.

en: Meg didn't even look at me.

en: Meg found a four leaf clover.

en: Meg has a facility for languages.

en: Meg cleared her desk.

en: Meg attends many school affairs.
zh: 梅格参加了很多学校活动。

en: Meg has a cat as a pet.
zh: 梅格养了一只猫当宠物。

en: Meg is filled with excitement.

en: Meg was happy about meeting Tom again.

en: Meg is beating a drum.

en: Meg sometimes annoys Ken.

en: Meg bought a can of tomatoes.

en: Meg agreed to Ken's plan.

en: Meg has a lovely face.

en: Meg is the double of her mother.

en: Meg talks too much.

en: Meg's hair curls naturally.
zh: 梅格的头发是自然卷。

en: Meg is as tall as Ken.

en: Meg's shoes are a little loose.

zh: 我碰到了梅格，她把那个消息告诉我了。

en: Meg and Ken sat on the bench.

en: Have you ever been to Mexico?
zh: 你去过墨西哥吗？

en: Mexico has half as many people as Japan.
zh: 墨西哥的人口只有日本的一半。

en: A revolution broke out in Mexico.
zh: 墨西哥爆发了革命。

en: Mention Mexico, and tacos come to mind.
zh: 一提到墨西哥，就会想到塔可。

zh: 墨西哥人说西班牙语。

zh: 墨西哥说的是西班牙语。

zh: 我在墨西哥过得很不容易，因为西班牙语我不是全能听懂。

zh: 我搞不明白他说的“megafeps”是什么意思。

en: Fancy forgetting my glasses, it's so embarrassing.

en: Who is that gentleman in spectacles?

zh: 我找不到眼镜了，可能落在火车上了。

en: I can't find my glasses.
zh: 我找不到我的眼镜了。

en: Keep in touch by mail.

en: I would like to chat with you by e-mail.

zh: 梅森医生把工作看得比什么都重要。

en: Read the meter.

zh: 五一劳动节也是全世界劳动者的节日。

en: We are having fish for our main course.

en: Each child has an individual way of thinking.

en: Each has his own taste.
zh: 每个人都有自己的口味。

en: I'll deal out three to each.

en: Each of them carried their own pack.
zh: 他们每个人都背着自己的包。

zh: 梅布尔打桥牌的时候喜欢闲扯。

en: May sometimes spends the time by herself.
zh: 阿美有时喜欢一个人待着。

en: May has been in Japan for a year.
zh: 阿美在日本待了一年了。

zh: 阿美的衣服在屋里扔得到处都是。

en: The maid announced each guest.

zh: 你跟阿美结婚前见过她姨吗？

zh: 女佣在桌上摆好了刀叉。

en: Go and wake up Mary.
zh: 去把玛丽叫醒。

zh: 玛丽在日本住了这么久，你不觉得她该适应一下日本的习俗了吗？

zh: 我听说玛丽想跟他离婚。

en: Mary is both intelligent and kind.
zh: 玛丽既聪明又善良。

en: Mary took out the eggs one by one.
zh: 玛丽把鸡蛋一个一个拿了出来。

en: Mary is going to have a baby next month.
zh: 玛丽下个月就要生了。

en: Mary won't listen to her friend's advice.
zh: 玛丽不听朋友的劝告。

en: Mary is going to help us tomorrow.
zh: 玛丽明天会来帮我们。

zh: 玛丽让她妹妹擦窗户。

en: Mary isn't really sick; she's only putting it on.
zh: 玛丽不是真病，她是装的。

en: Mary is a bookworm.
zh: 玛丽是个书呆子。

en: Mary is such a worrywart.
zh: 玛丽这人特别爱瞎操心。

en: Mary really takes after her mother.
zh: 玛丽长得真像她妈。

en: Mary looks like her mother.
zh: 玛丽长得像她妈。

en: Mary resembles her mother in appearance, but not in character.
zh: 玛丽长得像她妈，但性格不像。

en: Mary takes after her father.

zh: 玛丽搂住了她爸爸的脖子。

en: Mary looks unfriendly, but she is really very kind at heart.
zh: 玛丽看着挺冷的，但其实心肠特别好。

en: Mary is not poor. On the contrary, she is quite rich.
zh: 玛丽可不穷，相反，她挺有钱的。

en: Mary kept on working in spite of her illness.
zh: 玛丽虽然病了，但还是坚持工作。

en: Mary arrived at the hospital.
zh: 玛丽到医院了。

en: Mary hurried to the hospital.
zh: 玛丽急急忙忙赶往医院。

en: In her misery, Mary looked to her husband for help.
zh: 玛丽在痛苦中向丈夫寻求帮助。

en: Mary is not as tall as he.
zh: 玛丽没他高。

en: Mary asked after his father.
zh: 玛丽问候了他爸爸。

en: Mary is at a loss what to say to him.
zh: 玛丽不知道该对他说什么好。

en: Mary refused to marry him, but she gave in at last.
zh: 玛丽本来不想嫁给他，但最后还是妥协了。

en: Mary is tall.
zh: 玛丽个子挺高的。

en: Mary spoke Japanese slowly.
zh: 玛丽慢悠悠地说着日语。

en: Mary can speak Japanese.
zh: 玛丽会说日语。

en: Mary is setting by money to go to Japan.
zh: 玛丽在攒钱去日本。

en: Mary remained single all her life in Japan.
zh: 玛丽在日本一辈子没结婚。

en: Mary likes Japan, doesn't she?
zh: 玛丽喜欢日本，对吧？

en: Mary was reading, with a cat sleeping beside her.
zh: 玛丽正在看书，旁边还睡着只猫。

en: Mary understands Chinese.
zh: 玛丽懂中文。

en: Mary took her beauty sleep before the big party.
zh: 玛丽在大派对前睡了个美容觉。

en: Mary often hums a tune as she works in the kitchen.
zh: 玛丽在厨房干活时经常哼着小曲儿。

en: Mary is not used to being made fun of in the presence of others.
zh: 玛丽不习惯当着大家的面被开玩笑。

en: Mary likes skiing the best of all.
zh: 玛丽最喜欢滑雪了。

en: Mary gazed at George in admiration.
zh: 玛丽满脸崇拜地盯着乔治看。

en: Mary asked her son to behave himself.
zh: 玛丽叫她儿子听话点儿。

en: Mary ran.
zh: 玛丽跑了。

en: Mary shut herself up in the room, with all the windows closed.
zh: 玛丽把自己关在屋里，窗户全关得死死的。

en: Mary felt happy when she learned the results of the election.
zh: 玛丽知道选举结果后特别高兴。

en: Mary was able to swim across the river.
zh: 玛丽游过了那条河。

en: Mary has been ill in bed since last Monday.
zh: 玛丽从上周一开始就一直病在床上。

en: Mary is said to have been ill last week, but she looks well now.
zh: 听说玛丽上周病了，但现在看着挺精神的。

en: Mary went on a voyage around the world.
zh: 玛丽去环球航行了。

en: Mary was so kind as to help me.
zh: 玛丽人真好，还帮了我。

en: In her elementary school days, Mary dreamed of becoming a teacher.
zh: 玛丽上小学那会儿，梦想是当老师。

en: Mary is an ingenuous student.
zh: 玛丽是个很天真的学生。

en: Mary ought to do her homework on time.
zh: 玛丽应该按时写作业。

en: Mary said she would do her homework.
zh: 玛丽说她会写作业的。

en: Mary is very ill and I'm afraid she is dying.
zh: 玛丽病得很重，恐怕快不行了。

en: Mary showed the letter to me.
zh: 玛丽给我看了那封信。

en: Mary stood with her hand shading her eyes.
zh: 玛丽站着，用手遮在眼睛上方挡光。

en: Mary is said to have been a great singer in her youth.
zh: 听说玛丽年轻的时候是个很棒的歌手。

en: Mary has a social nature.
zh: 玛丽这人挺爱社交的。

en: Mary is studying in her room.
zh: 玛丽在屋里学习。

en: Mary put her piano up for sale.
zh: 玛丽要把她的钢琴卖掉。

en: Mary didn't refer to the accident she had seen.
zh: 玛丽没提她看到的那个事故。

en: Mary oiled her bicycle.
zh: 玛丽给自行车上了油。

en: Mary's kind nature quickly won her the friendship of her classmates.
zh: 玛丽心肠很好，很快就和同学们打成了一片。

en: Mary came up to me when she saw me.
zh: 玛丽看见我就朝我走过来了。

en: Mary gave me an American doll.
zh: 玛丽送了我一个美国洋娃娃。

en: Mary said to me, "are you ill?"
zh: 玛丽问我：“你病了吗？”

en: Mary told me that she was glad to see me.
zh: 玛丽跟我说她见到我很开心。

en: Mary broke in on our conversation.
zh: 玛丽打断了我们的谈话。

en: Mary took sides with me against my teacher.
zh: 玛丽跟我站一边，反对我的老师。

en: Mary scarcely seems to care for me, does she?
zh: 玛丽好像几乎不在乎我，对吧？

en: Mary blamed Jack for leaving their children unattended.
zh: 玛丽责怪杰克把孩子丢下没人管。

en: Mary stayed up late last night.
zh: 玛丽昨晚熬夜了。

en: Mary doesn't dance much now, but I know she used to a lot.
zh: 玛丽现在不怎么跳舞了，但我知道她以前经常跳。

en: Mary was about to burst out laughing.
zh: 玛丽差点笑出声来。

en: Mary has finished her Japanese assignment.
zh: 玛丽写完了日语作业。

en: How is Mary?
zh: 玛丽最近怎么样？

en: Mary was John's heartthrob all through high school.
zh: 玛丽在整个高中时期都是约翰的梦中情人。

en: When Mary was spoken to by a stranger, she was at a loss for words.
zh: 陌生人跟玛丽搭讪时，她不知道该说什么好。

en: Despite the fact that Mary keeps saying I was the only man she'd like to marry, when I proposed to her, she said "NO". I cannot make head or tail of it.
zh: 尽管玛丽一直说我是她唯一想嫁的人，但我向她求婚时，她居然拒绝了。我完全搞不懂是怎么回事。

en: Mary stared back at him in surprise.
zh: 玛丽惊讶地盯着他看。

en: Mary looked at herself in the mirror.
zh: 玛丽照了照镜子。

en: Mary spread the big map on the table.
zh: 玛丽在桌上铺开了一张大地图。

en: Mary is sitting at the desk.
zh: 玛丽正坐在书桌前。

en: Mary pretended she was sick to avoid going to school.
zh: 玛丽为了逃学假装生病。

en: Mary had to go to school.
zh: 玛丽必须得去学校。

en: Mary went down to the kitchen.
zh: 玛丽下楼去厨房了。

en: Mary is respected by everyone.
zh: 玛丽深受大家的尊重。

en: Mary can swim.
zh: 玛丽会游泳。

en: Mary can't swim, and John can't, either.
zh: 玛丽不会游泳，约翰也不会。

en: Mary has nobody to talk with, but she doesn't feel lonely.
zh: 玛丽没人聊天，但她并不觉得孤单。

en: Mary is a girl who is pleasant to talk with.
zh: 玛丽是个很好聊的女孩。

en: Mary decided never to see him any more.
zh: 玛丽决定再也不见他了。

en: Has Mary started yet?
zh: 玛丽出发了吗？

en: Mary likes milk very much.
zh: 玛丽非常喜欢喝牛奶。

en: Mary has not started yet.
zh: 玛丽还没出发。

en: Mary has failed again. After all she is still young.
zh: 玛丽又失败了，不过她毕竟还年轻。

en: Mary always assists her boyfriend in doing his assignments.
zh: 玛丽总是帮她男朋友写作业。

en: Mary can't even read French, much less speak it.
zh: 玛丽连法语都看不懂，更别说说了。

en: Mary takes Bill's kindness for granted.
zh: 玛丽觉得比尔对她好是理所当然的。

en: Mary had a dance with him at the party.
zh: 玛丽在派对上跟他跳了支舞。

en: Mary plays the piano.
zh: 玛丽会弹钢琴。

en: Mary is a very sociable person.
zh: 玛丽是个很爱交际的人。

en: Mary is too stubborn to apologize.
zh: 玛丽太倔了，不肯道歉。

en: Mary is so nice a girl that she is loved by everybody.
zh: 玛丽是个特别好的女孩，大家都喜欢她。

en: Mary is a very pretty girl.
zh: 玛丽是个很漂亮的女孩。

en: Mary said to herself "What shall I do?".
zh: 玛丽自言自语道：“我该怎么办呢？”

en: Mary closed the door quietly.
zh: 玛丽轻轻地关上了门。

en: It is believed that Mary is good at tennis.
zh: 大家都说玛丽网球打得挺好。

en: Mary has just come home.
zh: 玛丽刚回到家。

en: Mary became a typist.
zh: 玛丽当了一名打字员。

en: Mary is the prettier of the two.
zh: 玛丽是两个里更漂亮的那一个。

en: Mary is the cuter of the two.
zh: 玛丽是两个里面更可爱的那个。

en: Mary weighed it in her hand.
zh: 玛丽在手里掂了掂。

en: Mary is very attached to the little girl.
zh: 玛丽跟那个小女孩特别亲。

en: Mary played the role of an old woman in the play.
zh: 玛丽在剧里演了个老太太。

en: Mary seems to be bored with the game.
zh: 玛丽好像玩腻了这个游戏。

en: Mary hit on a marvelous idea.
zh: 玛丽突然想到了个绝妙的主意。

en: Mary loses her temper easily.
zh: 玛丽爱发脾气。

en: Mary told John the secret.
zh: 玛丽把秘密告诉了约翰。

en: Mary swims as fast as Jack.
zh: 玛丽游得和杰克一样快。

en: Suspecting him of telling her secret to some of her friends, Mary was angry with Jim.
zh: 玛丽怀疑吉姆把她的秘密告诉了朋友，所以很生他的气。

en: Mary declined an invitation to the concert.
zh: 玛丽拒绝了音乐会的邀请。

en: Mary has always been successful in everything she has done.
zh: 玛丽做什么事都很成功。

en: Mary sings best of all of the girls in class.
zh: 玛丽是班里女生中唱歌唱得最好的。

en: Mary is the prettiest girl in her class.
zh: 玛丽是她们班最漂亮的女生。

en: Mary is not used to being made fun of.
zh: 玛丽不习惯被人开玩笑。

en: Mary is cute. So is Jane.
zh: 玛丽很可爱，简也是。

en: Mary is helping her mother.
zh: 玛丽正在帮她妈妈。

en: Mary denied having stolen the money.
zh: 玛丽不承认偷了钱。

en: Mary set the basket on the table.
zh: 玛丽把篮子放在桌子上了。

en: Mary always has to put her two cents worth in.
zh: 玛丽总爱在那儿插嘴说两句。

en: Someone remarked that Mary was always late for meetings.
zh: 有人随口说了句玛丽开会老迟到。

en: Mary is always acting foolishly.
zh: 玛丽总是做傻事。

en: Mary always studies for two hours a day.
zh: 玛丽每天都要学习两个小时。

en: Mary was not worthy of your trust.
zh: 玛丽不值得你信任。

en: Mary said she was going to dance all night.
zh: 玛丽说她要跳通宵。

en: Mary got the nod from among some 500 applicants.
zh: 玛丽在500多名应聘者中被选中了。

en: Mary goes to that restaurant for lunch every other day.
zh: 玛丽隔一天就去那家餐厅吃午饭。

en: Mary went over to the United States in her late teens.
zh: 玛丽快二十岁的时候去了美国。

en: Mary had been knitting for an hour when I called.
zh: 我打电话的时候，玛丽已经织了一个小时的毛衣了。

en: Mary has as attractive a personality as her sister.
zh: 玛丽和她姐姐一样，性格非常有魅力。

en: Mary promised her mother that she would help her more often.
zh: 玛丽答应她妈妈会多帮帮她。

en: Mary would often sit alone on the porch.
zh: 玛丽以前经常一个人坐在门廊上。

en: When did you learn of Mary's divorce?
zh: 你什么时候知道玛丽离婚的？

en: I met a friend of Mary's.
zh: 我遇到了个玛丽的朋友。

en: Mary's eyes were filled with tears.
zh: 玛丽眼里噙满了泪水。

en: I'm going to make a cake for Mary's birthday.
zh: 我要给玛丽做一个生日蛋糕。

en: Mary's new hairstyle made her stand out in the crowd.
zh: 玛丽的新发型让她在人群中很显眼。

en: What was the result of Mary's test?
zh: 玛丽的考试结果怎么样？

en: I do not like Mary's living there alone.
zh: 我不喜欢玛丽一个人在那儿住。

en: It's a pity that Mary has no sense of humor.
zh: 真可惜，玛丽一点儿幽默感都没有。

en: Mary is in want of common sense.
zh: 玛丽缺乏常识。

en: I have always had a soft spot in my heart for Mary.
zh: 我一直对玛丽很有好感。

en: Mary and her sister took turns at looking after their sick mother.
zh: 玛丽和她姐妹轮流照顾生病的母亲。

en: Mary and I are in the same class.
zh: 玛丽和我同一个班。

en: Mary and I became good friends.
zh: 玛丽和我成了好朋友。

en: Mary and I were ill in bed yesterday.
zh: 昨天玛丽和我都在卧床生病。

en: Mary and I have been acquainted with each other for many years.
zh: 玛丽和我认识好多年了。

en: Mary and I remained firm friends for years.
zh: 玛丽和我这么多年的友谊一直很稳固。

en: It was sheer coincidence that Mary and I were on the same train.
zh: 玛丽和我坐同一趟火车纯属巧合。

en: Speaking of Mary, I have not seen her for a long time.
zh: 说到玛丽，我好久没见到她了。
